game.controllers

Interface Controller

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EmptyController, LoopingController, PlayerController

    public interface Controller
    The controller interface allows for different ways of characters being controlled.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Optional<Action> selectedAction(Character subject, Actions actions, GameMap map, Display display)
      Select an action to perform.

    • Method Detail

      • selectedAction

        java.util.Optional<Action> selectedAction(Character subject,
                                          Actions actions,
                                          GameMap map,
                                          Display display)
        Select an action to perform. May return an empty optional.
        Parameters:
        subject - character to perform the action
        actions - collection of possible Actions for this Actor
        map - the map containing the Actor
        display - the I/O object to which messages may be written
        Returns:
        the Action to be performed
